price: 74. Si Nous n’avions pas affermi ta position, tu aurais quelque peu  penché pour eux.
arabic: وَلَوۡلَآ أَن ثَبَّتۡنَٰكَ لَقَدۡ كِدتَّ تَرۡكَنُ إِلَيۡهِمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا قَلِيلًا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walawlā an thabbatnāka laqad kidtta tarkanu ilayhim shayan qalīlan
